[[=]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/SxXDyMK.gif]]
++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7133602451680185643?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7007 Misfortune Gorge]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** vktm7k.mp4, vktm7k.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7133602451680185643?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en 
> **Derivative of:** SCP-7XXX by GrigoriKarpin and Vivarium
[[/<]]
-----

I like this article because it is funny, I like announcer characters, I like VKTM, and also because I hate the foundation. 

Okay bye! 

Actually I will say more. I like long character driven pieces like this and I feel so bad for Echo.

Also I fucking spent the entirety of the drawing COMPLETELY MISSING the part where Kincaid had grey skin so that's why the time lapse is like that.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
